name: Star fighter (itch) (canibalHom)
description:
You are the captain of the most powerful Star Fighter 3000 spaceship and the fate of the whole world is in your hands! Your enemies — Cyber Swarm , an alien swarm of robots that destroys all in its path: stars, planets, galaxies. The next world Cyber Swarm will destroy might be your own and only you can save it from destruction! Sweep through outer space, avoiding collisions with dangerous objects. Destroy the alien starships, defeat their generals and save the galaxy from inevitable death!
Star Fighter is a space shooter steeped in the nostalgia spirit of 80s retro arcade games with modern graphics. Fly a powerful spaceship of the future and protect your planet from the looming threat.

BEAUTIFUL GRAPHICS even on low-end devices.
BRIGHT EFFECTS fully immerse you in space battles.
INTERESTING BOSSES will challenge your skills.
DYNAMIC LEVELS leave no dull moment and will keep you on your... thumbs
ATMOSPHERIC SOUNDTRACK adds dynamic and atmosphere to each level.
LEADERBOARD lets you compete with your friends for the highest score.
REWARDS for special achievements.
SIMPLE CONTROLS allow this space shooter to be played even by children;
Choose your preferred control option (using gyroscope or touch control) and start saving space!

The game is completely free and runs even on outdated devices. Suitable for all ages, everyone can feel like a pilot of a spaceship. Tight controls will allow you to spend long hours in this space simulator!
